      • update

        public <G extends Group> G update(G group,
                         boolean forceMembersToAcceptAgreement)
        Description copied from interface: GroupService
        Saves the specified group. The forceMembersToAcceptAgreement is only used for member groups, and means that if there is an agreement, all members will be forced to (re-)accept it
        Specified by:
        update in interface GroupService
